Nighlight:

"i see"said softly Nightlight"I need to know something else: would 
you loved me if I'd choosed remain here with you as Predacon... or 
you... you...?  "

She couldn't end the phrase... 


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> It hurt Rodimus to see the frustration and pain on his wifes face. 
He heald her hand and tried to explain.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: A Predacon spy named Flicker had infultrated our 
base, earned our trust. We called him friend. Then he sabotaged our 
defences and kidnapped you. We pursued him and ended with a huge 
battle with the Preds. In the end they escaped with you. From that 
point I would say you were in a lab while they reprogrammed you. 
Then as you know, you were Blackstorm. Then we got you back by going 
after you when the Preds were distracted, dealing with the 
Tripredacus.
> 
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Nightlight/Elita::
> 
> Nightlight sat down close to Rodimus and she heard Elita giggles, 
> which were fading until the baby fell sleep.
> 
> "I feel... confused... anger... "said Nighlgiht but she felt that 
> words weren't enough to explain how she was feeling in that 
moment"I 
> just can assure that I'm not the same Nighlight as I used to be... 
> and in someway... I'm still BlackStorm..."she stopped trying to 
> orginiz her ideas"I curently desire to know what really happens 
> among our last date and when I awake in Pred lab... I can't 
> remember, and I need remember... It such...confuse... I... don't 
> sure if I'm still trustwortly... "
> 
> She wasn't sure what say, her face mirrowed confution,... pain.
> 
>
